message.content:
{"id": "124067", "title": "Bug 124067: Relative path not supported when selecting XML file", 
"description": "When selecting an XML file, the application should support relative paths.", 
"OB": "Currently, when selecting an XML file, the application does not support relative paths. As a result, the user is unable to use relative paths when specifying the location of the file.", 
"EB": "The application should be updated to allow users to use relative paths when selecting an XML file. This will provide more flexibility in specifying the location of the file and improve the usability of the application.", 
"SR": "To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps:
1. Create a new data source within the application.
2. Select a dataset.
3. Choose an XML file as the data source for the dataset, ensuring that the file is located in a directory relative to the application.
4. Observe that the application does not accept the relative path and is unable to load the XML file.

Expected behavior: The application should support relative paths when selecting an XML file, allowing the user to successfully load the file and use it as a data source for the dataset."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '124067', 'title': 'Bug 124067When select the XML file, the relative path should be supported.', 'description': 'Bug 124067When select the XML file, the relative path should be supported. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'new a datasource and dataset based on a XML file3. '}
